entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
